extendedInfo.description: Disabled Dating & Chat is the premier android app for disabled adults looking for dating, relationships, and romance!Disabled Dating & Chat makes it easy for disabled women and men  to search for and find others in their area looking for romance, friendship, and companionship.Users can sign up for free and get access to the below features:*Search by age, location, interests, and more*Send a limited number of emails to other users*View profiles of matching members for free*Send & Receive an unlimited number of winks*Add and Remove pictures & videos to your profile*Communicate privately*Safe & SecureWith over 10 million members we are one of the largest disabled singles dating sites on the internet!Don't waste another minute with standard dating sites, when we are focused specifically on disabled singles and their devotees. Check us out today and see what all the fuss it about!Download the free Disabled Dating & Chat app today for free and find your perfect match!

reviews.title: Find Me
reviews.comment: Ok app but want single woman to find me goto my profile for other info
reviews.author: Reginald Hawkins

reviews.title: Not paying to see matches
reviews.comment: This site is not worth paying for uninstalled right away
reviews.author: Clint Irwin

reviews.title: What a blessing
reviews.comment: Truly love this app as a way of meeting others that understand me and my struggles.
reviews.author: Lyman Bartlett

reviews.title: So very glad I found thus
reviews.comment: U can\'t tell you how happy I am to have found this app. I have met so many truly great people thanks to this app.
reviews.author: May Curcio

reviews.title: What a blessing
reviews.comment: I feel quite fortunate to have found this app. Have met sol many great people.
reviews.author: Agnes Germany
